attributes.action: Grant reduced service pensions to those who served in the armed service for less than the current qualifying period
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many ex-servicemen and women in the past did not qualify for a service pension because of the number of years they had to qualify and the rules of contract when they signed on. Today those who sign on get a pension for a much greater reduced period. This is an unfair ruling that discriminates against ex servicemen and women some of whom served in hostile areas of the world in defence of their goverment and country.
